attributes.action: Review the Mario Kart (Wii) online scoring algorithm
attributes.additional_details:
The law determining points gained during a Mario Kart (Wii) online gaming session is not fit for purpose. It is impossible to keep your score consistently over 7000 points, and we request a debate in the Commons to address this issue which is currently effecting thousands of innocent gamers across the UK.

Also blue shells suck, and I’d like to see that algorithm revised, but perhaps we need a separate debate on that?
